text: "Nice for What" is the second single off of Canadian rapper Drake's fifth studio album Scorpion. The song was released on April 6, 2018. The song samples the 1998 song "Ex-Factor" by Lauren Hill. On April 8, 2018, a music video for the song was released. The music video was directed by Karena Evans. It features multiple women doing different activities in their daily lives. Different celebrities made appearances in the video such as Olivia Wilde and Tiffany Haddish. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Nice for What" on YouTube Category:2018 songs Category:Drake (musician) songs
title: Nice for What
